Singleplayer'ı ayrı bir güzel olan, hikayesi ve oynayışı harika olan Half-Life 50'den fazla yayın tarafından ''Yılın Oyunu'' olarak seçilmiştir. Multiplayer'ı ayrı eğlencelidir. Hele ki arkadaşlarınızla oynayacaksanız daha da eğleneceksiniz. Yani, kendisi bir efsanedir.
Ничего сказать не могу.Это просто класная игра
Gráficos que en esta época uno se podría reir xD .. peroooo !!!! la historia ... sin duda una fascinante manera de pasar el tiempo y sin duda ... si juegas el primero ... querras ir por los demas.

A game that started my interest in video games. It all happened when my dad's friend gave a copy of this game (back in 2005 in CD) to me and played on Windows XP. As child I didnt beat the game but finally I did it (on Normal level at time of writing).

It's a masterpiece first shooter games after DOOM & Wolfenstein that sets foundation of what FPS game should be. No cut scenes, no switching characters in mid game, no loot boxes, pure run and gun style, pure horror of surviving all hostile forces (Xen, military & black ops), pure skills of dodging damages and shooting, pure immersion of experience with good soundtracks. Good amount of puzzle and timing skills (that's right, remember to quicksave to retain game progress), excellent story telling but limited non-player character interactions and allies targeting speed. Worst cases scenario, there is only one guard in whole area available to unlock to next area. If he dies, the game have to restarted at nearest save you have. It tests skills of conserving ammo and health while carefully navigating areas dealing maximum damage. 

Graphic wise very outdated with pixels visible at close distance, it now can run smoothly on most modern computers, unless you have computers older that WIndows XP. It's a must play for all shooters lovers out there, buy in valve complete pack for best value. It's a cult classic FPS game for every steam library. And it has so many mods available out there based on this game.

10/10 Masterpiece

 This is a game that everybody should play it once to understand why people think this was the best game of its time. It's Half Life you should have played it by now.

 You need to give a pass for graphics and sounds since this game is old but the mechanics of the game still holds well.

λ When you feel games not so fun as many years ago, it is time for games that never get too old. HL one of such games. I have short list of games which I don't rush to play. They are like last bastion, waiting for their time for 10-20 years. When it seems that games don't make you happy, it is time for such games. 

The time has come after 12 years of MMO and 20+ years of gaming. I thought single-player games cannot be so fun, but then... I decided to play several games I kept to play in case of emergency. Fallout and Half-Life. 

 HL is a mix of fps and puzzles with breathtaking story. You could not like some game genres, but HL is the game you must play anyway. Even if you think that game cannot be interesting 10-20-30 years after release. λ

Прошёл эту игры спустя 21 год после релиза.
И скажу, что не разочаровался.
+Отличный сюжет.
+Графика не 2019 года, но проходить её было приятно.
+Атмосфера.
+Музыкальное сопровождение.
-Баги:
    Застревал в некоторых текстурах
А так: "Рекомендовано к приобретению"

Самая культовая игра своего времени, так сказать прорыв индустрии игр для своего времени! Сюжет игры по началу был очень загадочен и непонятен, но чем глубже ты погружаешься в этот мир тем понятнее становится что и зачем делать!
Живой онлайн спустя 21 год, что тут еще сказать!
